price: Humayo kayo tungo sa anino [ng usok] na may tatlong sangay,
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
